description.raw:
Maybe this is a good opportunity to use model versions? I'm not sure if they are actually parsed by Gazebo.

If we merge this like this, note to whoever was relying on the houses the previous size, if you'd like to keep using the old size, you can paste the old SDF's `<model>` element directly into your world.

New sizes now fit adults:

![house1.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/1823572454-house1.png)

![house2.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/1771793855-house2.png)

![house3new.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/1725378725-house3new.png)

And `house_1` now matches its collapsed version (`collapsed_house`):

![house1col.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/1840508864-house1col.png)

title: Scale houses to reasonable size
